solution_line_template: The weight of apples used for juice and given to the restaurant is {apples_given_to_restaurant} + {apples_for_juice} = <<{apples_given_to_restaurant}+{apples_for_juice}={apples_used_or_given}>>{apples_used_or_given} kg
Thus {total_harvested_apples} - {apples_used_or_given} = <<{total_harvested_apples}-{apples_used_or_given}={apples_sold}>>{apples_sold}kg worth of apples were sold in 5 kg bags.
So each bag was sold for {total_sale_revenue} / {number_of_bags_sold} = ${total_sale_revenue}/{number_of_bags_sold}={price_per_bag}>>{price_per_bag}
